topic.title: sound problem?
topic.body:
Hey guys. I'm trying to create a goofy one-off website, kinda like a YTMND or something (for those that remember that). The gif part of the website works just fine! However, the audio part does not. The idea is to have looping background music that autoplays alongside the gif, but no matter what I do, I just can't seem to get that working! It's not a problem with my HTML coding skills, as the audio does work when I try publishing the website on the clearnet (I used a free geocities account to testrun that), however when I try to submit the website here on zeronet, you can't hear the audio!
Here's the link to the zite I'm trying to create btw: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GCGN6wcGCqyGRVtAZxcEJ2oge9bCziAKo/
If anyone can help me, please let me know!

8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body:

1552478761_1Ekf2tGQLhG3iifFsuUk9RcBPx26c.body:
I tried it ones, thinking it was free speech discord and joined a loli server. I was wrong. Almost everyone got their accounts suspended. 
I've concluded that the best discord alternative is Riot.im
